response.overview: CoComelon has been entertaining pre-schoolers and their parents on the small screen, and this Christmas, following a successful release in the summer, JJ and his friends will be singing and dancing their way on to the big screen as a collection of ‘Best of Christmas’ are brought to cinemas across the UK for toddlers and their parents to enjoy.  This theatrical release will feature a programme of some of the most popular festive rhymes and Christmas songs from the CoComelon library including Jingle Bells, We Wish You a Merry Christmas and Twinkle Twinkle Christmas Star. The lyrics will appear on the bottom of the screen and audiences are encouraged to sing and dance along to create mini parties across the country.
response.title: CoComelon: Best of Christmas
